doc.field: Series II: Communist Party Writings [Division II: My Writings (Portfolios 16 - 25)]:
Series II: Communist Party Writings [Division II: My Writings (Portfolios 16 - 25)]:

Works written during 1939-1941 when I taught classes organized by F. Brown, National Organizational Secretary of the CPUSA; worked as assistant to V.J. Jerome, editor of The Communist; commenced work on "The history of the U.S.A., vol. I" (enclosed); and completed a work on Spinoza for my M.A. at the University of Virginia (also enclosed)

Works written during 1939-1941 when I taught classes organized by F. Brown, National Organizational Secretary of the CPUSA; worked as assistant to V.J. Jerome, editor of The Communist; commenced work on "The history of the U.S.A., vol. I" (enclosed); and completed a work on Spinoza for my M.A. at the University of Virginia (also enclosed)
Series II: Communist Party Writings [Division II: My Writings (Portfolios 16 - 25)]:

I" (enclosed); and completed a work on Spinoza for my M.A. at the University of Virginia (also enclosed)
